[vc_row content_full_width=”1″ el_class=”homeslider-row”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Harvey Boulter, CEO of Porton Group

In addition to their extensive legal knowledge of the local jurisdiction, they are responsive, accessible, professional, friendly, honest and, above all, know us and our business well enough to provide a highly personalized touch throughout their legal services.

Mustafa Al Ansari, Managing Director at Access Dubai

Their ability to execute in a practical and pragmatic manner I believe is their biggest strength. By covering technical loopholes and paying attention to the legal details is what distinguishes them from any other law firm. As my late father used to say: ‘I never felt safe before I knew Ali Hassan’.

Wadih Haddad, Founder and CEO of The Box ME

Choosing a Law firm to act on your behalf requires much trust, professionalism and care, with Ali Hassan & Associates you receive that genuinely.

Mahsa Amirizadeh, Managing Director at Design Master LLC

They are not a “payment first, question later” type of firm and it was the main factor that impressed me the most. From the first appointment, I knew our case is in capable hands and it was handled very well by their attorneys and staff.

Abdul Funsho, General Manager at Funsho International Group

Ali Hassan & Associates are one of the few law firms I have found in the UAE that sincerely care about their clients. They are transparent in their dealings and willing to go the extra mile to ensure their client’s satisfaction.

Mohamad Diab, Commercial Manager at Emper perfumes and cosmetics

I would highly recommend Ali Hassan and Associates as they always provide me with very sound legal advice, and more importantly they have always managed to obtain successful results in my cases.

Nasir Ahmed Mohammad, General Manager at UIC Gulf General Trading

Our rights as a corporate entity and as employer before the courts were well-protected by their advocates, not to mention the prompt delivery of their qualified advices as well as the rendering of legal support by their consultants whenever needed, even during rest days or holidays.

Ali Hassan & Associates was founded in 2003 with a strong vision of providing exceptional legal representation in the UAE. With over 18 years of experience the firm has proven success and understanding of the legal system and its framework. This success is founded on the philosophy of offering support and professional advice to clients whilst still dealing with each case in a culturally sensitive manner.

Regardless of the area of law, Ali Hassan’s lawyers are dedicated to achieving the best possible outcome for our clients with sophisticated yet practical legal advice to avoid unnecessary complications and stress for the client. With ongoing and frequent expansion plans, the firm has always been able to cater to the growing demand while maintaining integrity and professionalism.
